meanings.def: the mother of your father or mother
examples: I always loved going to visit my grandmother.

meanings.def: to tell or show somebody how to do something that they can already do well, and probably better than you can

idioms.idiom: teach your grandmother to suck eggs
idioms.def: to tell or show somebody how to do something that they can already do well, and probably better than you can
